name: The Crypto Games: Bitcoin Tycoon
description:
Hey, you want to get prey? We have it! Here you can tap bitcoin and count the hash on your mining farm very easily.

Get bitcoin, pump an improvement for your farm, create your mining pool - it's like a clan, develop a different business: banks, cinemas, amusement parks, museums or build your spaceport!

Put your clicks into the crypto currency and try to become the best miner!

Do you like "The Crypto Games"? Leave a good review!
If you have any questions, write to: mail@blackbears.mobi

Remember, the bitcoins of the game cannot be cashed, but it does not make them worse :—)
